attributes.action: ensure that homeless families are assisted properly and fairly by their local authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From personal experience I lost my home and spent 12 months in "temporary" accommodation.  I was originally found to be intentionally homeless and denied any permanent accommodation.  That decision was overturned on appeal and since then I have been found a property.  The local authority in question have failed in their duty to my family and other families.  Anyone losing their home needs quick and proactive intervention not a year of uncertainty and stress
